name: Deborah Denney
text: Love their pizzas. We usually order from the app on my phone mostly carry out. Great deals. The service is great. Even when we go in to eat. They take good care of us. Our drinks stayed filled. Pizza stays fresh on the buffet. As well as the salad bar and the pasta.

name: gary reynolds
text: We stopped for the lunch buffet  today. The pizza that was out for consumption was cold so we decided to wait for fresh hot pizza. After 15 minutes of waiting we complained to the manager and was told hot pizza was coming out right away. â€¦More

name: venus parrigan
text: Gone lol not there anymore

name: Ashley Wright
text: Great service, friendly and professional.

name: Jj Cheney
text: Love pizza huts cheese sticks, their sauce, and their pan pizza. I just wish they were not so slow and short staffed

name: Kim Rhoades
text: I like that they can deliver to my house I used to live out of the city limits

name: Anthony Turner
text: Charged for a pizza for an online delivery that did not go through.  Made no attempt to correct the situation, refund me my money, or take another pizza order.  When I asked for a refund I was told to talk to my bank.

name: Offroadjk
text: It is always carry out or delivery for me. Food is always correct and hot as soon as I get there. Usually visit at least once a month with little to no complaints. â€¦More

Can't never go wrong with Pizza Hut pizza

name: Teresa Willis
text: They need undercover boss to come in there bad. Our food was burnt and the floor was absolutely disgusting and the tables to not clean. The bathrooms were nasty. We was the only people there. So I know they had plenty of time to clean...

name: Donna Coleman
text: This pizza hut needs a total make over, it was pitiful!! Very unclean and the service was terrible. I've always loved pizza hut pizza, but ours was more crust than anything. There was very little sauce on the pizza and they brought the appetizer with the pizza.

name: Tabitha Traverse
text: Went to pick my food up. Pizzas were right but they tried serving me frozen wings since they forgot to cook them. I asked for a manager & all he had to say was sorry. Didnâ€™t even offer for my food to be free or at a discount. I will never go back.

text: They were super nice and took care of us. We had a church group of 29 and they kept us in food. The staff was very nice.

name: john paul
text:
Food was good, but the order was wrong (free pizza though) floor had left over pizza und3r the table when we got there,  we had to get our own drinks, the drink machine was  making a mess with its drip, and the restroom was nasty.
The rest if the restaurant was nice, music wasnt too loud, and it was inexpensive.
